Package com.xrtb.db

Contains a very simple database structure, as a hashmap, for use with the administration portal The intent is to be as simple as possible.

See: Description

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    Database
    A class that makes a simple database for use by the Campaign admin portal
    Pool  
    User  

Package com.xrtb.db Description

Contains a very simple database structure, as a hashmap, for use with the administration portal The intent is to be as simple as possible. A commercial implementation would have a lot more capability but for a prototype, we just need a simple setup. The idea is to store the database of users and their campaigns as a JSON file.
Author:
Ben M. Faul
